alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:11PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Kit Carson County through 545 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Arriba, or 12 miles northwest of Flagler, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flagler around 530 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 391 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
